lint: pnpm pes lint:css pnpm pes lint:js
lint-fix: pnpm pes lint-fix:css pnpm pes lint-fix:js
build: pnpm pes lint-fix && pnpm pes build-c && pnpm pes build-f
build-c: pnpm pes build-c-man && pnpm pes build-c-zip
build-c-man: pnpm pes rm-c && parcel build src/chrome/manifest.json --dist-dir dist/chrome --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --no-cache --detailed-report 0
build-f: pnpm pes build-f-man && pnpm pes build-f-zip
build-f-man: pnpm pes rm-f && parcel build src/firefox/manifest.json --dist-dir dist/firefox --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --no-cache --detailed-report 0
dev-c: pnpm pes rm-c && pnpm pes server-c
dev-f: pnpm pes rm-f && pnpm pes server-f
